CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Property Viewed stage positioned above or below the Contract Signed stage?
SRP.A: The Property Viewed stage is positioned {above} the Contract Signed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Property Viewed?
VE.A: The value of stage Property Viewed is {374}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Property Listed?
VE.A: The value of stage Property Listed is {558}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Property Listed, with a value of {558}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Sale Closed, with a value of {109}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Contract Signed to stage Sale Closed?
SC.A: Decreased by {83} Properties from stage Contract Signed to stage Sale Closed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 422? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Listed} stage has {558}, the {Initial Inquiries} stage has {470}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 236? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Contract Signed} stage has {192}, the {Sale Closed} stage has {109}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 236 and 422? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Viewed} stage has {374}, the {Negotiation} stage has {281}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Initial Inquiries to Property Viewed, or from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Inquiries} to {Property Viewed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed, or from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Viewed} to stage {Negotiation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Inquiries} and {Property Viewed} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Contract Signed} and {Sale Closed} stages.
